page.title: 17REDHILL'S FOCAL POINT
page.content: The{Warwick Quadrant}is a new { {shopping/civic }centre which is at present being built in the middle of { {Redhill. } Its boundaries are Princess Way, Station Rd, Queensway & London Rd. A bus station will be built in Princess Way - a new road. The{Warwick Quadrant}covers l02 000 square feet of ground, including a 50 000 square foot supermarket & 52 000 square feet of small shops. The{shops}open Autumn, l985 and the other amenities including the Sports Hall in the Summer of l986. The Civic Hall will seat 500 people. It is expected that more people will shop & visit {Redhill. { }There will be some{office}develop- ment in the Warwick Quadrant. There are many other new office blocks being built all over the town.
